text: American singer and songwriter Lisa Fischer has released one studio album and 14 singles (including 2 as a featured artist). She has performed background vocals on albums of many singers including Luther Vandross, Evelyn "Champagne" King, Nona Hendryx, Tina Turner, and many other singers. ==Albums== {| class="wikitable plainrowheaders" style="text-align:center;" border="1" |+ List of studio albums, with selected chart positions, sales figures and certifications ! XXVIII (CD/Album) *2016: Yo-Yo Ma and the Silk Road Ensemble- Sing Me Home (album) *2016: The Rolling Stones- Totally Stripped (CD/DVD) *2016: Lang Lang- New York Rhapsody (album) *2016: Lang Lang- Live at Lincoln Center Presents New York Rhapsody (DVD/Blu-ray) *2017: The Rolling Stones- Sticky Fingers – Live At The Fonda Theatre 2015 (CD/DVD) *2018: The Rolling Stones- San Jose '99 (CD/DVD) *2018: The Rolling Stones- Voodoo Lounge Uncut (CD/DVD) *2019: The Rolling Stones- HONK (2CD) *2019: The Rolling Stones- Bridges To Buenos Aires (CD/DVD) *2020: The Rolling Stones- Steel Wheels Live (CD/DVD) ==Soundtrack appearances== {| class="wikitable plainrowheaders" border="1" |- ! scope="col"| Song ! scope="col"| Year ! scope="col"| Movie |- ! scope="row"| "Glad to Be Alive" | 1990 | The Adventures of Ford Fairlane |- ! scope="row"| "O Come All Ye Faithful" | rowspan="2"|1992 | Home Alone 2: Lost in New York |- ! scope="row"| "Ruler of My Heart" | That Night |- ! scope="row"| "Colors of Love" | 1993 | Made in America |- ! scope="row"| "Way Past Goodbye" | 1998 | Melrose Place Jazz |- ! scope="row"| "Fingers" | 2001 | Cowboy Bebop: Future Blues |- ! scope="row"| "Sure On This Shining Night" | rowspan="2"|2013 | rowspan="2"|20 Feet from Stardom |- ! scope="row"| "Lean on Me" |- |} ==Notes== ==References== ==External links== * * Category:Pop music discographies Category:Rhythm and blues discographies Category:Soul music discographies
